column4: i installed a ciber, but there are 11 pcs.. the connection in the ciber is so slow for downloadin on live.. i need aMSN just for double-click installation without downloading (nothing)... help men! thanks xD
already told you what to do in #ubuntu-es
Sorry, i can't see your help 'cuz the connections was down
i told you before. install in one pc and use aptoncd to move the packages to the other ones. that way you only download once
